title: Exams Invigilator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at British Council
Interview Descriptions: It's a very easy interview, they ask you a few questions over the phone then you attend a video call interview on zoom if you passed it you get accepted
Interview Questions: Introduction of yourself and work experience

title: Exam Invigilator Interview
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview was easy . Asking about academic education.How I knew about the job.I was a bit worry but it passed well.I have online interview .I will be an exciting experience .I hope so
Interview Questions: Tell us about your experience as a teacher

title: Exam Invigilator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was an easy interview. Just several questions about how to deal with the situation or to tell them about a situation you had before like how do you manage your time and how to deal with angry customer
Interview Questions: How to deal with one doesn't like you?

title: Exams Services Officer Interview
Interview Descriptions:
Usually it starts with filling the application form, it is important that the applicant fill the information correctly and update sufficient information in the personal statement. 
after initial screening is completed, it is set forward for an interview
Interview Questions: First question is usually about the past experience, professional development that are relevant to the job, so make this very well prepared

title: Exams Invigilator Interview
Interview Descriptions:
20 mins  interview of personal normal questions like experience and availability with 3 HRs and entered with 2 other  candidates at the office which lies in Agouza,Cairo,Egypt .
The interview went smoothly and I was free to enquire or ask about anything.
Interview Questions:
1-Having customer service experience ?
2- How many available days are you ?

title: Contact Centre Agent Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Via video conference, the video conference app is Microsoft Teams.  A panel of three,  Contact Centre Manager, Contact Centre Supervisor, and an HR Recruiter.  Competency-based interview, the duration is 45 minutes.
Interview Questions: How would you deliver negative or bad news?

title: Invigilator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Easy. Application then an online interview due to COVID. I got word about 2 weeks late that I got accepted. They ask general questions. About your past education and they set case scenarios and ask you what you would do. I dont think that there is a right and wrong answer.
Interview Questions: Check up above I added some details

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council
Interview Descriptions: Online interview  with managers ,  ff sdfsfsd fededw efefwv ffrm efgrf safdacf dfsdgsg fgsgsf sgds gg sdg gs sg sgsd g gdg sgs gss gsgsg sgsdg sggsgdds gssgsfggfg sgsgf gsgssg

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was smooth, Great, Charming, Wonderful in a great way that will reflect your whole way of seeing the whole  perspective as it was  very smooth  how ever this thing is not a very great thing but in a different way it was a great thing

title: Program Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at British Council in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions:
The process took three weeks after filling their electronic application, I have been contacted by their HR representative, who has promised to assist me with any difficulties; yet, she did not even reply my email asking for a certain assistant.

As arriving at the British Council, I had to wait till the team of three interviews arrives. The program manager and assistant introduced themselves, except for the HR representative who remained unfriendly.

The interview estimated time was between 30 t0 45 minutes, moreover, the feedback took 7 business days with an email with the "promise" to giving me a fell feedback, still no reply as a form of the continuous unethical response of the HR.

title: Programs Manager - Arts Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Several steps to the process including a 3 hour English test and a one hour interview with a panel composed of 3 executives. They ask you questions related to your experience.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in the job and the British Council?

title: Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at British Council
Interview Descriptions: Description of the interview process: online application then an english exam (writing and reading,Grammar )then after approx one week they called me for an interview (technical interview) before i got hired
Interview Questions: questions like identify your self, technical questions related to the post, your greatest achievements, prior experience, and why British council etc..

title: Invigilator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: A simple phone interview ended with an invitation to a face to face interview. It was a group of four candidates and two interviewers. Same questions for each candidate about team work, customer service, skills and experiences.the duration was about 45 minutes. They were nice and friendly.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with an angry customer or children ?

title: Higher Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks, they sent me an email inviting me to the interview in a week time. they as well, asked me to prepare a presentation about a new exams they are having in egypt. I interviewed at British Council.
Interview Questions: I had a face-to-face interview with 3 interviewers, the academic head, the assistant head and the HR. After my presentation they asked questions about experience, skills, BC behaviours, problems in class and how to solve it, etc. I received a response 10 days later by email.

title: Branch Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, about 2 weeks later my application was shortlisted. I was asked to attend an Aptis test to qualify for an interview. There was a panel of 3 managers interviewing me and were reading from a pre-scripted questions. it was too straightforward and only needed to memorise different examples from own experience.
Interview Questions: It was primarily asking for giving examples of different scenarios from my work experience.

title: Estate and Administrative Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: In the interview you will likely be asked questions about your teamwork skills, your interpersonal relations, your management style or your ability to work in a diverse environment. Review the job posting again and try to anticipate other likely areas of questioning, and prepare honest and concise answers that highlight relevant aspects of your work history and life experience. Remember that there may be questions you did not anticipate: when this happens, breathe and take a moment to think through your experiences to find the best answers.
Interview Questions: When can you start working with us?

title: Marketing Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: the interview was a panel of 3 people. the interview was 7 questions; 2 technical questions, 2 introductory questions and some behavioural questions for 45 minutes. the hiring process is good.

title: YLA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at British Council (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was nice and easy. They were basically testing my English speaking and my experience with children. It was fast, took no more than 15 mins and we were done.
Interview Questions: Do you have previous experience in working with children?
